quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost; when health is lost, something is lost; when character is lost, all is lost.
author: Billy Graham

quote: The first wealth is health.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Everybody needs beauty as well as bread, places to play in and pray in, where nature may heal and give strength to body and soul.
author: John Muir

quote: Being in control of your life and having realistic expectations about your day-to-day challenges are the keys to stress management, which is perhaps the most important ingredient to living a happy, healthy and rewarding life.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
author: Paul Walker

quote: My personal goals are to be happy, healthy and to be surrounded by loved ones.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: A wise man should consider that health is the greatest of human blessings, and learn how by his own thought to derive benefit from his illnesses.
author: Hippocrates

quote: The healthy man does not torture others - generally it is the tortured who turn into torturers.
author: Carl Jung

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: I know a man who gave up smoking, drinking, sex, and rich food. He was healthy right up to the day he killed himself.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: You're in pretty good shape for the shape you are in.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: It is amazing that people who think we cannot afford to pay for doctors, hospitals, and medication somehow think that we can afford to pay for doctors, hospitals, medication and a government bureaucracy to administer it.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: America's health care system is neither healthy, caring, nor a system.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: Happiness lies first of all in health.
author: George William Curtis

quote: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Investing in health will produce enormous benefits.
author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

quote: Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: It takes more than just a good looking body. You've got to have the heart and soul to go with it.
author: Epictetus

quote: Attention to health is life's greatest hindrance.
author: Plato

quote: A person whose mind is quiet and satisfied in God is in the pathway to health.
author: Ellen G. White

quote: Health is not a condition of matter, but of Mind.
author: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: The art of healing comes from nature, not from the physician. Therefore the physician must start from nature, with an open mind.
author: Paracelsus

quote: It's better to be healthy alone than sick with someone else.
author: Phil McGraw

quote: I made a commitment to completely cut out drinking and anything that might hamper me from getting my mind and body together. And the floodgates of goodness have opened upon me - spiritually and financially.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: I think the healthy way to live is to make friends with the beast inside oneself, and that means not the beast but the shadow. The dark side of one's nature. Have fun with it and you know, is to accept everything about ourselves.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Knowing that we can be loved exactly as we are gives us all the best opportunity for growing into the healthiest of people.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
author: Robin Wright

quote: True silence is the rest of the mind, and is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
author: William Penn

quote: Treasure the love you receive above all. It will survive long after your good health has vanished.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.
author: Redd Foxx

quote: America's health care system is in crisis precisely because we systematically neglect wellness and prevention.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: It's no longer a question of staying healthy. It's a question of finding a sickness you like.
author: Jackie Mason

quote: Water, air, and cleanness are the chief articles in my pharmacy.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The ingredients of health and long life, are great temperance, open air, easy labor, and little care.
author: Philip Sidney

quote: The medical literature tells us that the most effective ways to reduce the risk of heart disease, cancer, stroke, diabetes, Alzheimer's, and many more problems are through healthy diet and exercise. Our bodies have evolved to move, yet we now use the energy in oil instead of muscles to do our work.
author: David Suzuki

quote: I think that age as a number is not nearly as important as health. You can be in poor health and be pretty miserable at 40 or 50. If you're in good health, you can enjoy things into your 80s.
author: Bob Barker

quote: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life, which fade and are tasteless without it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Liberty is to the collective body, what health is to every individual body. Without health no pleasure can be tasted by man; without liberty, no happiness can be enjoyed by society.
author: Henry St. John

quote: Give a man health and a course to steer, and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: You know, true love really matters, friends really matter, family really matters. Being responsible and disciplined and healthy really matters.
author: Courtney Thorne-Smith

quote: A man is not rightly conditioned until he is a happy, healthy, and prosperous being; and happiness, health, and prosperity are the result of a harmonious adjustment of the inner with the outer of the man with his surroundings.
author: James Allen

quote: I sit on my duff, smoke cigarettes and watch TV. I'm not exactly a poster girl for healthy living.
author: Lexa Doig

quote: As long as your body is healthy and under control and death is distant, try to save your soul; when death is immanent what can you do?
author: Chanakya

quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: I do not think about being beautiful. What I devote most of my time to is being healthy.
author: Ann Bancroft
